ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow!  SS BP!!!  was: Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... well, i can t say what our strategy is (insert uber-guild flame here).  i don t like saying that, but i have to abide by it.  i will say that i don t think
ygData.messageBody:
> Any tips/strategies?

well, i can't say what our strategy is (insert uber-guild flame here). i
don't like saying that, but i have to abide by it. i will say that i don't
think we ever tried the air pet attack, and i don't think our one cleric
with MoK (awesome spell and extremely rare) has gotten it to land on trak
yet. it took us a few wipe outs to figure out the best way, and i'm sure
you guys will too and feel much better getting it on your own.

> On a funny note, a monk of ours was roaming near trak and got
> casted on, hit
> once and fd with 25hp, he FD his way to the zone, funny screenshots.

lol those crazy monks. i bet it took him a little bit of time to go that
far FDing the whole way hehe.

Shada Iceheart, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
